sources.title: Bedelia
sources.description: “Above average” “Well done mystery” “Fast moving suspense yarn” “Good mystery thriller” (IMDB reviews quotes). Margaret Lockwood is the mysterious lady with a dark past in this four-star suspense drama. Ian Hunter costars as her new husband who may have gotten more than he bargained for. Good supporting cast and adequate production values. Recommended. IMDB rating 7.0. Directed by Lance Comfort. Released in 1946 (UK). Complete print (tape transfer).

metadata.Plot: Bedelia Carrington is living happily, it appears, in Monte Carlo with her husband Charlie Carrington. But a cultivated young artist, Ben Chaney, begins probing into her past with curious concern. Chaney, who is really a detective, learns that Bedelia's obsession for money has led her, in the past, to husband-poisoning for the insurance money.
metadata.Writer: Vera Caspary, Herbert Victor, Isadore Goldsmith
metadata.Actors: Margaret Lockwood, Ian Hunter, Barry K. Barnes
